content.rendered:
[vc_row type=”container”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]Accu-Beam® Beamsplitter Adapters convert the beamsplitter you already own into a Zeiss exit port. This allows the beamsplitter to work with all of our products and any other Zeiss accessory.

  • Makes your beamsplitter compatible with our adapters
  • Converts almost any beamsplitter to Zeiss
  • Compatible with most major models of beamsplitter
  • Low cost alternative to purchasing a new beamsplitter
  • Does not impact the image or alignment

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_gallery type=”flexslider_slide” interval=”3″ images=”72874,72873,72875″ img_size=”400×267″ onclick=”img_link_large” css=”.vc_custom_1577878609804{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_separator color=”#e5e5e5″ type=”normal” thickness=”1″ up=”” down=””][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Beamsplitter Adapters

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Our products are built with Zeiss-style ports for the widest range of compatibility. While Zeiss may be the most common style of beamsplitter, not every brand uses the Zeiss exit port. Beamsplitter adapters are a low-cost option to convert your existing beamsplitter to work with any Zeiss accessory.

If you don’t already have a beamsplitter we manufacture many different styles compatible with various brands. Visit our Beamsplitters page to learn more.

Various part numbers[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_tta_tabs color=”white” active_section=”1″][vc_tta_section title=”Compatibility” tab_id=”1569386751404-824b66ba-0d54450c-53b3″][vc_column_text]Compatible with Nikon, CSO, Kaps, Global, Leica/WILD, Moller-Wedel, Aus Jena, Seiler, Topcon, Haag-Streit, Rodenstock, and more.

Haag-Streit disclaimer[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Regulatory” tab_id=”1569386751419-a33a2db6-6e3d450c-53b3″][vc_column_text]Beamsplitter adapters are a class 1 device, and are approved to bear the CE mark.

TTI Medical is registered with the FDA and ISO 13485:2016 certified.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Warranty” tab_id=”1569387831165-1b59dea1-014a450c-53b3″][vc_column_text]

All of our products include a 1 year manufacturer’s warranty and support for the usable lifetime of the product.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_tabs][/vc_column][/vc_row]
